Package cambio.simulator.entities.networking

Class Request

java.lang.Object
desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent
desmoj.core.simulator.Schedulable
desmoj.core.simulator.Entity
cambio.simulator.entities.networking.Request
Direct Known Subclasses:
InternalRequest, RequestAnswer, UserRequest
public abstract class Request
extends desmoj.core.simulator.Entity
Represents a Request that can travel between two MicroserviceInstances.
Author:
Lion Wagner

    • getRelatedDependency

      public NetworkDependency getRelatedDependency​(Request request)
      Gets the NetworkDependency that should be completed by the given request.
      Parameters:
      request - child request of this request.
      Returns:
      the NetworkDependency that is related to the given request, null otherwise.
